headline: Constellation Brands (STZ) Gains Upgrade as Hispanic Market Pressures Ease
summary: Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) ranks among the top consumer staples stocks according to hedge funds. Jefferies boosted its price target for Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) to $205 on July 7, upgrading the company from Hold to Buy. As pressure on the company’s primary Hispanic consumer base in the United States appears to be stabilizing, analysts […]

headline: 3 Value Stocks Skating on Thin Ice
summary: The low valuation multiples for value stocks provide a margin of safety that growth stocks rarely offer. However, the challenge lies in determining whether these cheap assets are genuinely undervalued or simply on sale due to their potentially deteriorating business models.
